data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 69,792 believers in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, help the 69,792 believers in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: There are 920,000 people living in the county of Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang. Only about 69,792 might be believers.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Qiang, Mianchi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang, Sichuan, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang, Sichuan, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.focus_label: Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang, Sichuan, China

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang, Sichuan, China the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
